description: Students continue to explore life in German-speaking countries, supported by cultural readings, films, and other authentic materials that help students develop vocabulary and inspire them to advance their writing and speaking skills. Taught in German, the course includes a review of selected grammar topics. Prerequisite: German 231 or placement by test.
name: Intermed German II
notes: Class periods to be arranged. First class meets July 16 at 2:30 p.m.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: German 231 or placement by test.

title: Intermediate German II
